name: femme
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(of a gay woman) behaving in a traditionally female way: a femme lesbian Compare
butch
a gay woman who behaves in a traditionally female way: She had been involved with a femme.
More examplesFewer examplesShe would later complain that femmes had been ignored by LGBT activists.Others wore traditionally feminine clothing and assumed a more diminutive role as femmes.
